# f5xc_ike_phase2_profile (Resource)

Shape of the IKE Phase2 profile specification

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_ike_phase2_profile" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the IKEPhase2Profile. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the IKEPhase2Profile will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `authentication_algos` (List of String) Authentication Algorithms. Choose one or more Authentication Algorithm. Use None option when using the aes-gcm or aes-ccm encryption algorithms. Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
- `dh_group_set` (Block, Optional) Diffie Hellman Groups. Choose the acceptable Diffie Hellman(DH) Group or Groups that you are willing to accept as part of this profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--dh_group_set))
- `disable_pfs` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--disable_pfs))
- `encryption_algos` (List of String) Encryption Algorithms. Choose one or more encryption algorithms. Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
- `ike_keylifetime_hours` (Block, Optional) Hours. Input Hours (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ike_keylifetime_hours))
- `ike_keylifetime_minutes` (Block, Optional) Minutes. Set IKE Key Lifetime in minutes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ike_keylifetime_minutes))
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.
- `use_default_keylifetime` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--use_default_keylifetime))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

### Nested Schema for `dh_group_set`

Optional:

- `dh_groups` (List of String) Diffie Hellman Groups. Choose the acceptable Diffie Hellman(DH) Group or Groups that you are willing to accept as part of this profile. Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true

Optional:

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_ike_phase2_profile.example system/example
```
